messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: For a strong and effective MP who will get the best deal for Bury vote David Nuttall on 7th May

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will always put the interests of my country and constituents first.
I believe in reducing taxes so people can keep more of the money they earn.
I want to see the people of Bury, Ramsbottom and Tottington get the best deal.

issues.economy: I believe in reducing taxes so people can keep more of the money they earn.

leaflet.personalStatement: David has been an independent minded MP prepared to stand up for what he believes in and put his constituents first.

politicalExperience.achievements: David has one of the best attendance records in the Commons participating in 95% of votes. David has helped thousands of constituents with their problems and queries.
Previously David ran a Solicitors practice so he understands the problems of small business.

politicalExperience.role: Churchwarden at St. Anne's Church in Tottington
Patron of Ramsbottom CC and President of Tottington's St Johns Sports Club
